children.text: As prescribed in 22.810(d), insert the following provision:

(a) It 
         
o 
 has developed and has on file, 
         
o 
 has not developed and does not have on file, at each establishment, affirmative action programs required by the rules and regulations of the Secretary of Labor (41 CFR 60-1 and 60-2); or

(b) It 
         
o 
 has not previously had contracts subject to the written affirmative action programs requirement of the rules and regulations of the Secretary of Labor.
